AWS_PING - Class in com.meltmedia.jgroups.aws
A discovery protocol that uses the AWS EC2 API to find cluster members.

findMembers(List<Address>, boolean, Responses) - Method in class com.meltmedia.jgroups.aws.AWS_PING
Fetches all of the cluster members found on EC2.

G

getInstanceTags(AmazonEC2, String) - Static method in class com.meltmedia.jgroups.aws.AWS_PING
Returns all of the tags defined on the EC2 instance with the specified instanceId.
getName() - Method in class com.meltmedia.jgroups.aws.AWS_PING
Returns the unique name for this protocol AWS_PING.
getPrivateIpAddresses() - Method in class com.meltmedia.jgroups.aws.AWS_PING
Gets the list of private IP addresses found in AWS based on the filters and tag names defined.

I

init() - Method in class com.meltmedia.jgroups.aws.AWS_PING
Scans the environment for information about the AWS node that we are currently running on and parses the filters and tags.
